metadata.title: CVE-2024-35916 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dma-buf: Fix NULL pointer dereference in sanitycheck()If due to a memory allocation failure mock_chain() returns NULL, it ispassed to dma_fence_enable_sw_signaling() resulting in NULL pointerdereference there.Call dma_fence_enable_sw_signaling() only if mock_chain() succeeds.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
